fields.name: Action Runner Input
fields.description: Defines the acceptable input for the Action Runner handler
fields.document: {'type': 'object', 'title': 'Action Runner Input', '$schema': 'http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema', 'required': ['action_input'], 'properties': {'action_input': {'type': 'array', 'items': {'$ref': '#/definitions/action'}, 'title': 'The Action Runner Input schema', 'description': 'Defines the input requirements for the Action Runner handler'}, 'additional_input': {'type': 'object', 'title': 'The Action Runner Additional Input schema', 'description': 'Defines the additional input requirements for the Action Runner handler'}}, 'definitions': {'action': {'type': 'object', 'properties': {'name': {'type': 'string'}, 'input': {'type': 'object'}, 'method': {'enum': ['die_roll', 'calculation', 'conditional', 'table'], 'type': 'string'}}}}, 'description': 'Defines the acceptable input for the Action Runner handler'}

fields.name: Die Roll Input
fields.description: Defines the acceptable input for the Die Roll handler
fields.document: {'type': 'object', 'title': 'Die Roll Input', '$schema': 'http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema', 'required': ['die_size', 'die_count'], 'properties': {'reroll': {'type': 'object', 'required': ['condition', 'value'], 'properties': {'value': {'type': ['string', 'integer']}, 'condition': {'enum': ['==', '>', '>=', '<', '<='], 'type': 'string'}}}, 'die_size': {'type': ['string', 'integer'], 'title': 'The Die Size schema', 'description': 'Defines the input requirements for the die_size of the Die Roll handler'}, 'die_count': {'type': ['string', 'integer'], 'title': 'The Die Count schema', 'description': 'Defines the input requirements for the die_roll of the Die Roll handler'}, 'pre_modifier': {'$ref': '#/definitions/modifier'}, 'post_modifier': {'$ref': '#/definitions/modifier'}, 'roll_modifier': {'$ref': '#/definitions/modifier'}}, 'definitions': {'modifier': {'type': 'object', 'required': ['value', 'type'], 'properties': {'type': {'enum': ['-', '+', '*', '/'], 'type': 'string'}, 'value': {'type': ['string', 'integer']}}}}, 'description': 'Defines the acceptable input for the Die Roll handler'}

fields.name: Book
fields.read_me:
`Book Model
==========
read_me
------------
This schema is for a book object. There are only three required fields in the json object: title, publisher and page count.

Example
--------
Below is an example of the minimum json object based on this schema:

```{ "title": "A Tale of Two Cities", "publisher": "Chapman & Hall", "pages": 341 }````
fields.document: {"$id":"http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/schemas/book-model","type":"object","title":"Book","$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#","required":["title","publisher","pages"],"properties":{"pages":{"type":"integer","title":"The Book pages schema","examples":["23","456"],"description":"The number of pages in the book."},"title":{"type":"string","title":"The Book title schema","examples":["Twilight: 2000, Version 2.2","Dark Conspiracy, 1st Edition"],"description":"The title of the book."},"format":{"enum":["Paperback","Hardcover","Magazine","PDF","EPUB","Mobipocket"],"type":"string","title":"The Book format schema","description":"The format the book was published in."},"isbn 10":{"type":"string","title":"The Book ISBN-10 schema","pattern":"^(?:ISBN(?:10)?(?:\\-10)?\\x20)?[0-9]{9}(\\d|X)$","examples":["1558780769","ISBN 1558780769","ISBN10 1558780769","ISBN-10 1558780769"],"description":"The ISBN-10 number assigned to the book."},"isbn 13":{"type":"string","title":"The Book ISBN-13 schema","pattern":"^(?:ISBN(?:13)?(?:\\-13)?\\x20)?:?97(?:8|9)[0-9]{10}$","examples":["9781558780767","ISBN 9781558780767","ISBN13 9781558780767","ISBN-13 9781558780767"],"description":"The ISBN-13 number assigned to the book."},"read_me":{"type":"string","title":"The Book read_me schema","examples":["Nuclear War has decimated the US, Europe and Asia. You are trying to survive in this new world, where modern technology is dying, roving bands of marauders want your provisions, and radiation is everywhere. Will you survive to find a way home?","Shapes that rip and tear. Shadows that live in corners. Windows in space and time that lead to realms of madness and decay. A dark lurking horror that feeds off the echoing anguish of a billion tortured souls. This is the center of a twisted, sinister conspiracy which threatens the very existence of all humankind. Set in the near future, the world of Dark Conspiracy is dramatically altered from today and is fraught with peril and challenges. The Metroplexes, where most of the world's population lives, are a blend of lawless gang turf and corporate fortresses ruled by men and women powerful enough to be above the law. The countryside is sparsely inhabited, its natives suspicious and violent. And increasing areas of countryside are turning into Demonground, from which few humans return."],"description":"The read_me of the book."},"publisher":{"type":"string","title":"The Book publisher schema","minimum":1,"examples":["Palladium Books","Game Designers' Workshop"],"description":"The publisher of the book."},"short title":{"type":"string","title":"The Book short title schema","examples":["Twilight: 2000","Dark Conspiracy"],"description":"The short version of the title for the book."},"catalog number":{"type":"string","title":"The Book catalog number schema","examples":["2000","2100","800-HC"],"description":"The catalog number associated with the book from the publisher."}},"definitions":{},"description":"Data required to populate a book class."}
